scenario3.Subject: A massively obese secret agent in a tuxedo that is bursting at the buttons, wearing dark sunglasses and holding a tiny martini glass between two sausage-like fingers. He has a slicked-back hairstyle and a cool, unbothered expression despite the chaos.
scenario3.Action: He is attempting to rappel down a mission impossible style laser hallway, but he is stuck mid-air because the rope is fraying under the weight. He is currently wedged between the floor and ceiling, accidentally tripping every single red laser beam with his belly and back simultaneously.
scenario3.Scene: A high-tech, futuristic server room with blue LED ambient lighting. Red alarm lights are flashing, and steam is venting from the ceiling tiles he just crashed through.
scenario3.Style: 9:16 vertical aspect ratio, blockbuster movie poster style, high contrast, teal and orange color grading.
scenario3.Technical(Negative Prompt): No hallucinations, no disfigured hands, no low resolution.

scenario4.Subject: A colossal man with a thick mustache, wearing floral pattern swimming trunks and floaties (water wings) on his upper arms that look like tiny bracelets. He is wearing diving goggles that squeeze his face comically.
scenario4.Action: He is cannonballing into a standard-sized backyard swimming pool. He is frozen at the moment of impact where the water is not just splashing, but evacuating the pool entirely in a massive tsunami-like sheet. A plastic flamingo floatie is being launched into the stratosphere by the shockwave.
scenario4.Scene: A suburban backyard BBQ party. The background shows terrified party guests holding burgers, freezing in shock. Bright summer sunlight, water droplets captured in crystal clear high shutter speed detail.
scenario4.Style: 9:16 vertical aspect ratio, YouTube thumbnail style, vibrant colors, exaggerated facial expressions.
scenario4.Technical(Negative Prompt): No hallucinations, no melding of bodies, no water physics glitches.

scenario5.Subject: A heavily obese skateboarder wearing baggy 90s grunge clothing, a backward baseball cap, and knee pads that are struggling to stay on. He has a scruffy beard and a look of pure terror mixed with excitement.
scenario5.Action: He is grinding a rail on a skateboard, but the skateboard has snapped in half under the weight, and the metal rail he is grinding on is bending downward into a 'U' shape. He is maintaining balance with his arms flailing wildly.
scenario5.Scene: An urban skate park covered in graffiti. In the foreground, wide-eyed teenagers with cameras are capturing the moment. The concrete below is cracking from the pressure. Harsh afternoon sunlight casting sharp shadows.
scenario5.Style: 9:16 vertical aspect ratio, fisheye lens effect, energetic composition, highly detailed texture.
scenario5.Technical(Negative Prompt): No hallucinations, no floating objects, no impossible geometry.
